data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Sokoto to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sokoto, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Sokoto, Nigeria. Please, stir the 1,093,459 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.section_summary: On average, 12 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Sokoto, Nigeria.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, remind your church in Sokoto, Nigeria that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Sokoto, Nigeria that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Shanga people. Make the Shanga people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Sokoto.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Sokoto, Nigeria to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Sokoto. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

location.name: Sokoto
location.people_groups_list: Dukawa, Western, Lela, Dakakari, Banga, Puku
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dukawa, Western (63,000), Lela, Dakakari (172,000), Banga (25,000), Puku (71,000)
